action.script:
cd ${repo:path}
git stash push -u -m "Pre-export auto stash."
cd DrawIODOC
chmod +x ./exportMacos.sh
./exportMacos.sh
git add .
git commit -am "Auto export of documentation."
git push
git stash pop

ui.description: Would you like to commit and push the export?
ui.title: Export documentation
